adrFormatAddress: 35 Montgomery St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I’ve moved out of New York to the West Coast and had a fantastic experience with Orange Truck Movers. Alex was my point of contact and he explained in detail all the stages from preparation to actual dates of transporting and unloading my family's personal property, including a car. Communication was clear and professional, the date was scheduled and there were no delays. I met my moving team of 3 workers in Las Vegas to check the truck and car. They did a phenomenal job of packing my high-priced items and took extra steps to protect them during the several days of cross-country driving. I’d highly recommend OTM to anyone who is thinking about a long-distance move.

originalText.text: This was my second move with Orange Truck, and the service was superb. The movers were extremely respectful, careful, organized and diligent with all our belongings and completed everything in a timely manner. (We had a lot of stuff!) The business owner was also very communicative and made sure we had the proper COI forms needed for all buildings, and that we were happy with the service after it was done. I also called around for other quotes before hiring them, and they are indeed the best and most fair price you can get in the NYC area! I'm so happy with how everything turned out, I'll for sure be using them again.

originalText.text: This is my 23rd move and I have never had this great a moving experience! From the initial contact with Andrey to the end with Igor and his team, everything was seamless. Though their quote was more than reasonable, I originally hired another company who was a little less, and three days before my move, I trusted my gut that the Terms and Conditions of that company were a money grab. I contacted Andrey and he quickly moved their schedule around and made it happen, again, with only three days' notice, and he brought me boxes, packing paper and tape at no charge two days later as well as providing blankets and more supplies on moving day, all at no extra charge. Igor and his team were professional, extremely organized, competent and so attentive to protecting my furniture and ensuring my satisfaction.  I can't recommend this company enough!

originalText.text: I had a great experience with Orange Truck Movers. They communicated with me every step of the way and were very punctual throughout the moving process. Both the work and office staff were extremely friendly and professional and I'm so glad I used them! I will be recommending them to others.

originalText.text: They have moved me twice and I've always been happy with their service. They're on time, know what they're doing, they're professional and have great customer service. Highly recommend
